definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
(of a mountain) high and tapered peak or summit/mountain-like in appearance/highest level/classifier for camels

sentences.english: The manufacturing practice emphasizes on wave soldering, selective soldering, and rework.
sentences.chinese: 强调了波峰焊，选择性波峰焊和维修的制造工艺。

sentences.english: The manufacturing practice emphasizes on wave soldering, selective soldering, and rework.
sentences.chinese: 强调了波峰焊，选择性波峰焊和维修的制造工艺。

sentences.english: The ribbed crochet raises up peaks and valleys in the yarn.
sentences.chinese: 肋手钩纱提出在波峰和波谷。

sentences.english: Temperature selection of lead-free alloys in wave soldering is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 确定了几种无铅合金焊料最佳的波峰焊温度。

sentences.english: Got some sweet pictures of the half-moon and the valley crest and the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 有半月形和谷波峰和云的一些甜图片。

sentences.english: When combined in perpendicular direction, wave crest of the leaking light moves left.
sentences.chinese: 垂直组合时，泄漏光的波峰位左移。

sentences.english: Using the method of jet welding dismantling these through-hole components to avoid these problems.
sentences.chinese: 传统的通孔元件的焊接采用波峰焊或手工焊接。

sentences.english: That means both reflow soldering and wave soldering are used.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着既回流焊和波峰焊使用。

sentences.english: Selective pallets shall not be used in conjunction with a no-clean wave solder process.
sentences.chinese: 可选择的板不能用于免洗的波峰焊流程中。

sentences.english: Superior solder ability and resistance to soldering heat, ldeal for wave or reflow soldering.
sentences.chinese: 优良的可焊性及耐热冲击性，适合波峰焊及回流焊。

sentences.english: The strong support of PB-FREE wave soldering.
sentences.chinese: 无铅波峰焊接制程的坚强后盾。

sentences.english: And just as each wave has a crest, it also has a trough.
sentences.chinese: 正象波峰有高潮一样，它也有波谷。

sentences.english: To this end, I provide a new high in low-end lead-free wave soldering at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 为此，我公司在提供全新高低端无铅波峰焊的同时。

sentences.english: The wave soldering is used in through-hole type product.
sentences.chinese: 波峰焊是用于通孔类型产品。

sentences.english: Wave soldering, compatible with lead free soldering.
The component gate opens at the beginning of the peak.
sentences.chinese: 在波峰开始时，门电路打开。

definition: (of water, prices etc) to rise and fall
turning point/breaking point/inflexion point (math., a point of a curve at which the curvature changes sign)
to fall back (of water level or share prices)
